00029 #ifndef _GRAPHOBJ_H_
00030 #define _GRAPHOBJ_H_
00031 
00032 #ifdef WIN32
00033         #define WIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN
00034         #include <windows.h>
00035         #include <gl/glaux.h>            // Allows us to draw a sphere using
00036 #endif
00037 #if defined(__APPLE__) && defined(__MACH__)
00038         #include <OpenGL/gl.h>          // Header File For The OpenGL32 Library
00039         #include <OpenGL/glu.h> // Header File For The GLu32 Library
00040 #else
00041         #include <GL/gl.h>              // Header File For The OpenGL32 Library
00042         #include <GL/glu.h>     // Header File For The GLu32 Library
00043 #endif
00044 
00045 namespace GraphObj {
00046 
00047 class Base {
00048 public:
00049         Base () { }
00050         virtual ~Base() { }
00051 
00052         virtual void Render() = 0;
00053 };
00054 
00055 class Plane : public Base {
00056 public:
00057         Plane() { }
00058         virtual ~Plane() { }
00059 
00060         void Render();
00061 };
00062 
00063 class Sphere : public Base {
00064 public:
00065         Sphere() : m_Radius(1.0f) { }
00066         virtual ~Sphere() { }
00067 
00068         void Render();
00069         float m_Radius;
00070 };
00071 
00072 // x-y plane
00073 
00074 inline void Plane::Render()
00075 {
00076         const float kPlaneSize = 10.0f;
00077         glBegin(GL_LINES);
00078         glVertex3f(-kPlaneSize, 0.0f, 0.0f); glVertex3f(kPlaneSize, 0.0f, 0.0f);        // cross
00079         glVertex3f(0.0f, -kPlaneSize, 0.0f); glVertex3f(0.0f, kPlaneSize, 0.0f);        // cross
00080         glVertex3f(-0.5f * kPlaneSize, -0.5f * kPlaneSize, 0.0f); glVertex3f(-0.5f * kPlaneSize, 0.5f * kPlaneSize, 0.0f);  // box
00081         glVertex3f(-0.5f * kPlaneSize, 0.5f * kPlaneSize, 0.0f); glVertex3f(0.5f * kPlaneSize, 0.5f * kPlaneSize, 0.0f);
00082         glVertex3f(0.5f * kPlaneSize, 0.5f * kPlaneSize, 0.0f); glVertex3f(0.5f * kPlaneSize, -0.5f * kPlaneSize, 0.0f);
00083         glVertex3f(0.5f * kPlaneSize, -0.5f * kPlaneSize, 0.0f); glVertex3f(-0.5f * kPlaneSize, -0.5f * kPlaneSize, 0.0f);
00084         glEnd();
00085 }
00086 
00087 inline void Sphere::Render()
00088 {
00089         auxSolidSphere(m_Radius);
00090 }
00091 
00092 }       // end namespace GraphObj
